raw: “ The future is here , ” says one of the eight intrepid explorers who in 1991 walked into the sprawling three - acre greenhouse known as Biosphere 2 , for a two - year experiment in ecology and self - containment ( not to mention interpersonal psychology and power dynamics ) .

raw: “ Spaceship Earth , ” Matt Wolf ’s engaging documentary about a ragtag group of idealists who set out to explore the world — and then save it — could n’t be better timed : The film ’s distributor , Neon , is making it available on streaming because , really , what could be more relevant to the coronavirus lockdown than a chronicle of the 20th century ’s most famous self - quarantine ?

raw: People who remember the press hysteria surrounding Biosphere 2 might think of it as a spectacular flop , the utopian promise of its mission sullied by media spectacle and a few cheats along the way .
replaced: People who remember the press hysteria surrounding Biosphere 2  Biosphere 2 might think of the press hysteria surrounding Biosphere 2 as a spectacular flop , the utopian promise of Biosphere 2 mission sullied by media spectacle and a few cheats along the way .

raw: Eventually treated like a human diorama by the tourists who traveled to peer at them through the glass triangles of their quarters , the terrestrial astronauts ( terranauts ? ) who volunteered to sequester themselves in a collection of seven mini - biomes were tarred as a naive cult at best , and charlatans at worst .

raw: “ Spaceship Earth ” helpfully deconstructs those accusations , first by delving into the project ’s origins in 1960s San Francisco , when a charismatic Oklahoma transplant named John Allen gathered a group of bookish , artistically inclined young people to get things going , whether in the form of experimental plays , a farm in New Mexico or an oceangoing ship that they built from scratch in Oakland , Calif.
replaced: “ Spaceship Earth ” helpfully deconstructs those accusations , first by delving into the project ’s origins in 1960s San Francisco , when Allen gathered a group of bookish , artistically inclined young people to get things going , whether in the form of experimental plays , a farm in New Mexico or an oceangoing ship that a group of bookish , artistically inclined young people built from scratch in Oakland , Calif.

raw: After sailing the world , learning about global warming and attracting the attention and money of oil scion and environmentalist Ed Bass , Allen hit upon the idea of launching an earthbound test of what might eventually be a colony on Mars or the moon .
replaced: After sailing the world , learning about global warming and attracting the attention and money of oil scion and environmentalist Ed Bass , Allen hit upon the idea of launching an earthbound test of what might eventually be a colony on Mars or the moon .

raw: Luckily for us , Allen and his colleagues were compulsive recorders of their adventures , and one of the Biospherians , a physician named Roy Walford , brought a video camera into the complex .
replaced: Luckily for us , Allen  Allen and his colleagues  Allen colleagues were compulsive recorders of Allen and his colleagues adventures , and one of the Biospherians , a physician named Roy Walford , brought a video camera into Biosphere 2 .

raw: With a wealth of archival material to work with , Wolf does a superb job of sending viewers back into the 1980s and 1990s — whose scratchy , juddering VHS - era production values and “ Galaxy Quest”-worthy uniforms might be tough on the eyes , but are note - perfect in conjuring the time period .
replaced: With a wealth of archival material to work with , Wolf does a superb job of sending viewers back into the 1980s and 1990s — whose scratchy , juddering VHS - era production values and “ Galaxy Quest”-worthy uniforms might be tough on the eyes , but are note - perfect in conjuring the time period .

raw: He also interviews as many surviving participants as he can , giving “ Spaceship Earth ” a welcome note of self - awareness and perspective ( although no one addresses the conspicuous homogeneity of the group ) .
replaced: Wolf also interviews as many surviving participants as Wolf can , giving Spaceship Earth  Spaceship Earth ” a welcome note of self - awareness and perspective ( although no one addresses the conspicuous homogeneity of the group ) .

raw: Anyone who fears going stir crazy at a time when going to the store is more akin to scrubbing in for surgery than running a light errand will relate when tensions rise and systems begin to break down ; if the Biospherians ’ two - year sojourn in the Arizona desert proved anything , it might be just how much a whiff of fresh air can do .
replaced: Anyone who fears going stir crazy at a time when going to the store is more akin to scrubbing in for surgery than running a light errand will relate when tensions rise and systems begin to break down ; if the Biospherians ’ two - year sojourn in the Arizona desert proved anything , it might be just how much a whiff of fresh air can do .

raw: There ’s a third - act twist involving a present - day political figure that is so shocking , and strangely prescient , that divulging the details would n’t be sporting .
replaced: There ’s a third - act twist involving a present - day political figure that is so shocking , and strangely prescient , that divulging the details would n’t be sporting .

raw: Suffice it to say that , in addition to celebrating the energy , enterprise and idealism of America ’s postwar generation , “ Spaceship Earth ” provides a sobering primer in how some dreams die , and others are strangled mercilessly in their cribs .
replaced: Suffice it to say that , in addition to celebrating the energy , enterprise and idealism of America ’s postwar generation , “ Spaceship Earth ” provides a sobering primer in how some dreams die , and others are strangled mercilessly in others cribs .
